name: Kiwi In Arms
description:
The kiwi took the arms !

Use your arms to defeat that mighty eagle !

This game was made during a school game jam and we had 48 hours to ship the project.

Controls:

A and D to move the kiwi around
W or SPACE BAR to jump
Use the two mouse click to attack or Q and E

Credits: Devs and Game Design:
  • Enzo CLOUP  (nedeleko.itch.io)
  • Allan COUETTE (rayqdr.itch.io)
Graphs:
  • Fabier CAPELIER
Musics:
  • Warrior Rising by Ean Grimm
  • Glory - (Royalty Free Epic Music)
